programme.title: MST3K: Fugitive Alien
programme.desc: Joel and the Bots watch as an alien named Ken joins an Earth spaceship to fight against his former masters.

programme.title: MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II
programme.desc: Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987).

programme.title: MST3K: Time Of The Apes
programme.desc: Joel and the Bots watch a Japanese rip-off of Planet of the Apes.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera
programme.desc: A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965).

programme.title: MST3K: The Batwoman
programme.desc: Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

programme.title: Rifftrax: Hilbillys In A Haunted House
programme.desc: RiffTrax bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 60's non-scary horror classic!

programme.title: Backlot
programme.desc: A spinoff of the acclaimed King Kong film, Gorgo was a monster-from-the-sea movie with a European setting and strangely happy ending. In this look behind the making of the film, a movie that was later skewered in a fan favorite episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000, you'll learn how the Gorgo suit was created, why it's a bad idea to send a monster to Paris and more!

programme.title: Rifftrax: Icebreaker
programme.desc: It's Die Hard on Skis starring the legendary Bruce Campbell!

programme.title: Rifftrax: Prisoners Of The Lost Universe
programme.desc: RiffTrax, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 1983 sci-fi adventure classic!

programme.title: MST3K: The Dead Talk Back
programme.desc: Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.

programme.title: MST3K: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Can Hercules escape from the royal court and rescue the woman he loves, before it's too late?

programme.title: MST3K: Santa Claus
programme.desc: Mike and the bots watch Santa Claus mess around with a devil while trying to deliver gifts.

programme.title: MST3K: High School Big Shot
programme.desc: The crew fights lapsing into a depression while watching the incredibly dour High School Big Shot (1959).
